
# Notable Examples


## Larger Examples

- enumerate the way to split a sum in one atom + 2 sub-sums:

```
> {f[x,{y},{z}] :: x_+y__+z__<-a+b+c+d}
{f[a,{c,b},{d}],
 f[a,{d,b},{c}],
 f[a,{b},{d,c}],
 f[a,{d,c},{b}],
 f[a,{c},{d,b}],
 f[a,{d},{c,b}],
 f[b,{c,a},{d}],
 f[b,{d,a},{c}],
 f[b,{a},{d,c}],
 f[b,{d,c},{a}],
 f[b,{c},{d,a}],
 f[b,{d},{c,a}],
 f[c,{b,a},{d}],
 f[c,{d,a},{b}],
 f[c,{a},{d,b}],
 f[c,{d,b},{a}],
 f[c,{b},{d,a}],
 f[c,{d},{b,a}],
 f[d,{b,a},{c}],
 f[d,{c,a},{b}],
 f[d,{a},{c,b}],
 f[d,{c,b},{a}],
 f[d,{b},{c,a}],
 f[d,{c},{b,a}]}
```

- computing `3!!!`:

```
> ((#!&)^3)[3]

```
